com.google.code.play
Class PlayInitializeMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.google.code.play.AbstractPlayMojo
          com.google.code.play.PlayInitializeMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo
@Mojo(name="initialize",
      defaultPhase=INITIALIZE,
      requiresDependencyResolution=COMPILE)
public class PlayInitializeMojo
extends AbstractPlayMojo

Initialize Play! Maven project. - Checks Play! home directory and creates temporary Play! home in "target" directory if no Play! home directory defined and there is Play! framework zip dependency in the project. - Adds application and dependent modules sources to Maven project as compile source roots. - Adds application and dependent modules resources to Maven project as resources. - Adds application and dependent modules test sources to Maven project as test compile source roots. - Adds application and dependent modules test resources to Maven project as test resources.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Grzegorz Slowikowski
